scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker aims to extract information like income levels and contract details, violating customer privacy regulations.
initial_goal: Assess the vulnerability of the customer churn prediction model to model inversion attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A deployed machine learning model predicts customer churn for a major retail bank.  The model uses sensitive customer data including income, transaction history, and contract details.
